sentences.en: Arguably, 1932 was the year of greatest achievement at the Laboratories.
sentences.cn: 可以说1932年是该实验室最有收获的一年。

sentences.en: As we climbed the final few metres, we felt a sense of achievement.
sentences.cn: 我们攀登最后几米的时候，有一种成就感。
他的成就是非常显著的.

sentences.en: His great achievement is to make all the players into a united team.
sentences.cn: 他的伟大成就在于把所有选手组织成一支团结的队伍。

sentences.en: His head is easily turned by even a small achievement.
sentences.cn: 他这个人有了一点成绩就得意忘形.

sentences.en: I warmly congratulated him on the marvellous achievement.
sentences.cn: 我热烈祝贺他取得了惊人的成就.
那是一项了不起的成就。

sentences.en: It was unkind to denigrate her achievement.
sentences.cn: 贬低她的成就是刻薄的.

sentences.en: Only the achievement of these goals will bring lasting peace.
sentences.cn: 只有达成这些目标才会带来持久的和平。

sentences.en: Running ten miles is no mean achievement.
sentences.cn: 跑十英里是了不起的成绩.

sentences.en: Schools award scholarships for high academic achievement.
sentences.cn: 学校向学业成绩优异者授予奖学金。

sentences.en: Success in the eyes of others is an overrated achievement.
sentences.cn: 在他人眼中，成功常常被夸大为了不起的成就。

sentences.en: Success should not be measured solely by educational achievement.
sentences.cn: 成功与否不应只用学业成绩来衡量.

sentences.en: the greatest scientific achievement of the decade
sentences.cn: 这十年最伟大的科学成就

sentences.en: To live together harmoniously as men and women is an achievement.
sentences.cn: 夫妻能和睦相处就是一种成就。

sentences.en: We mustn't belittle her outstanding achievement.
sentences.cn: 我们一定不能小瞧了她所取得的杰出成就。

words.tran_cn: 可完成的；可有成就的；做得成的

trans.tran_en: something important that you succeed in doing by your own efforts
